title: Amppitune Chronicles Pro - Evolving Music Collection
description: Amppitune Chronicles Pro - 130+ Professional Music Tracks
longDescription:
Amppitune Chronicles Pro is an ever evolving collection of 130+ music tracks for gamedevs and content creators, ranging from orchestral to rock to electronica. Huge and inexpensive toolkit to carve out a professional and memorable soundtrack for your game and other projects. Memorable themes, epic action music, moody underscore, this collection has it all. But not only that, Amppitune Chronicles will receive new tracks as an update in the future, and will be an ever evolving source of top notch music for all kinds of projects.


Example of great use of a track Last Light you get in this collection.


Amppitune Chronicles Pro version comes with additional mixes, stems and loops (for a selection of tracks, see documentation for details) which give you even more music customization options for your project.


Every music track is provided as 44.1kHz 16bit uncompressed WAV's.


Preview all 130+ tracks on Youtube, or on Spotify.


If this collection doesn’t have what you’re looking for, contact me for custom commission music and sound effect work, and we will figure it out.


Music included in this collection is NOT registered with Youtube Content ID.


Full track listing documentation
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 352

Number of Audio Cues: 352

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAV's

Does music loop: Some yes, some no. Check documentation for details.

Minutes of audio provided: 1000

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All

Documentation: Full track listing documentation

Important/Additional Notes: Music included in this collection is NOT registered with Youtube Content ID.
